abstract: Brian Seibert describes scene at award ceremony for New York Dance and Performance Awards, or Bessies, hosted by Bebe Neuwirth.
snippet: The dance world’s Bessie Awards honored a range of dance figures, from the teenage tapper Caleb Teicher to the 74-year-old Tricia Brown.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: New York Dance and Performance Awards (Bessies)

lead_paragraph: The dance world’s Bessie Awards honored a range of dance figures, from the teenage tapper Caleb Teicher to the 74-year-old Tricia Brown.

headline.main: The Dance World Turns Out to Honor Its Own
headline.print_headline: The Dance World Turns Out to Honor Its Own
headline.seo: Bessie Awards for Dance Move to Apollo Theater
